Subskills.name: Double Bourbon
Subskills.description: Chance to throw an additional molotov.

Subskills.name: Heated Melting Point
Subskills.description: Moonshine molotovs now ignite into blue flames increasing its damage significantly.

Subskills.name: Scorching Collision
Subskills.description: Direct hits with the molotov breaks monsters fire resistances.

Subskills.name: Gas Leak
Subskills.description: Molotovs leave a small trail of fire as they travel.

Subskills.name: Oil Spilled Flask
Subskills.description: Chance for molotovs to spill oil around them.

Subskills.name: Blazing Trail of Flames
Subskills.description: Molotov now bounces additional times from the ground spilling small flames around.

Subskills.name: Redeeming Flames
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of spills from moonshine molotov.

Subskills.name: Bottle Flip
Subskills.description: Molotovs now bounce once when they hit the ground redirecting them towards the closest enemy.

Subskills.name: Set The World On Fire
Subskills.description: Throw multiple molotovs around you for a short period setting the world ablaze. Moonshine molotov now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Flaming Tar
Subskills.description: Direct hits cause enemies to leave a trail of fire wherever they go damaging other nearby enemies dealing increased damage and inflicting burning.
